pages.title: Aluminum Vein
pages.text: Aluminum Vein deposits tons of aluminum ores, if you haven't found bauxite yet.
Main Ore:Aluminum$(br)Associated Ores:None$(br2)Heights:80-130$(br2)Vein Spreadth:Very High$(br)Vein Density:Medium$(br2)Indicator:None$(br)Vein Rarity:Medium$(br2)Dimension:Overworld
